verses.verse: Now Pashur<WH6583> the son<WH1121> of Immer<WH564> the priest<WH3548>, who was also chief<WH6496> governor<WH5057> in the house<WH1004> of the LORD<WH3068>, heard<WH8085> that Jeremiah<WH3414> prophesied<WH5012> these things<WH1697>.

¶ O LORD<WH3068>, thou hast deceived<WH6601> me, and I was deceived<WH6601>: thou art stronger<WH2388> than I, and hast prevailed<WH3201>: I am in derision<WH7814> daily<WH3117>, every one mocketh<WH3932> me.

¶ Cursed<WH779> be the day<WH3117> wherein I was born<WH3205>: let not the day<WH3117> wherein my mother<WH517> bare<WH3205> me be blessed<WH1288>.
